programme.title: Panic 9-1-1 - I Need You to Put the Gun Down
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 1 In San Jose, California, a single mother with a gun must decide whether to face her would-be rapist unarmed or risk being accidentally shot by police rushing to save her.

programme.title: Panic 9-1-1 - He Told Me I Was Going to Die Today
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 2 A pregnant woman in suburban Denver is helpless as she is attacked by her stalker in her secluded home. In Indiana, neighbors and paramedics rush to save two girls who have fallen through the ice on a frozen lake.

programme.title: Panic 9-1-1 - I Plan on Leaving Here in a Body Bag
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 3 A rural California widow calls 911 in the middle of the night as someone tries to break into her home.

programme.title: Panic 9-1-1 - He's in My Room
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 1 A mom and her teenage son barricade themselves inside a closet and call 911 as an intruder searches for their hiding place. When a hiker is swept down a mountain in a wave of snow and buried alive, his cellphone is his only lifeline to the outside world.

programme.title: Panic 9-1-1 - I'm Gonna Shoot Your Head Off
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 2 An employee at a sporting goods store calls 911 as one of her customers uses an electric saw to cut his way into the store's ammunition and gun rack. While on a hike, two mothers witness an ice cave crash down on their two teenage sons.

programme.title: Panic 9-1-1 - I Don't Want To Die Like This
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 3 When a young woman sees two men crawl over her back fence, she dials 911 and as she begins to beg for help, she hears the sound of glass breaking downstairs.

programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 2 A bird's-eye view of Indonesia's spectacular scenery.

programme.desc: Season 1, Exploring the many faces of a breathtaking beach in Indonesia.

programme.desc: Season 1, Featuring a rugged coastline, especially at low tide, which opens up vast sandy beaches.

programme.title: Playa Fronton: Dominican Republic - Playa Fronton: Dominican Republic
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 2 The sand lies just beneath the soft lapping of waves on a Dominican tropical beach.

programme.title: Cadlao Lagoon: Philippines - Cadlao Lagoon: Philippines
programme.desc: Season 1, Experiencing the beauty of a turquoise lagoon flanked by impressive, vegetation-covered, mountains.

programme.title: Redwood Forest Rejuvenation - Redwood Forest Rejuvenation
programme.desc: Season 1, Transporting to the magical redwood forests of Northern California and soaking up the healing energies that only pure nature can provide, with multiple healing scenes from the old-grove forest, paired with real-life stereo nature sounds.

programme.title: Good Morning - Playa Madama, Dominican Republic
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 2 A view of Playa Madama, an unspoiled beach framed by high bluffs at the edge of the Dominican Republic.

programme.title: Golden Hour in Paradise - Golden Hour in Paradise
programme.desc: Season 1, A 4K UHD video collage with soft instrumental music from one moment in paradise to the next, with ambient nature sounds and soft music for deep relaxation.

programme.title: Fireplace: Banff - Fireplace: Banff
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 2 A truer-than-life fireplace filmed in Banff, Canada.

programme.title: Bizarre Murders - Psychic Sleuth
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 29 The head of a family-run maple syrup business disappears, and a psychic claims she's buried somewhere in the sugar shack.

programme.title: Bizarre Murders - American Booty
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 25 While her swinging husband is out of town, a successful New Hampshire woman is beaten to death with a sex paddle.

programme.title: Forensic Factor - Freemont Bomber
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 13 In one violent evening, a series of bombs rock the sleepy California city of Fremont. The targets include both the Chief and Ex-Chief of police. Can authorities and forensic scientists stop the Fremont Bomber before he strikes again?

programme.title: Forensic Factor - Vanished
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 14 After the owner of a private school for Asian students vanishes from his driveway, police scramble to find him as time begins to run out on the diabetic man. Investigators learn he has been kidnapped, but can they save him before it is too late?

programme.title: Cops UK: The Bodycam Squad - Episode 3
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 3 An afternoon drinker has his bell rung by an angry man in crutches, bodycam cops resort to desperate measures to prevent a tragedy, and a young man collapses among some late night trouble.

programme.title: Cops UK: The Bodycam Squad - Episode 4
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 4 The bodycam squad hunts for a burglar and are given the run around, a break in at a hotel unearths a mystery, and the cops are left tongue tied over the alleged theft of a bag.

programme.title: World’s Most Evil Killers - Sean Vincent Gillis
programme.desc: Season 6, Episode 13 The story of the serial killer who brutally snatched away the lives of eight innocent women during a decade-long killing spree in Louisiana.

programme.title: World’s Most Evil Killers - Judy Buenoano
programme.desc: Season 6, Episode 14 The story of a killer so evil that not even her own son could escape her clutches. She became the first woman to be executed in Florida since 1848.

programme.title: World’s Most Evil Killers - Don Miller
programme.desc: Season 6, Episode 15 The story of a terrifying killer who snatched away the lives of four victims before being caught while trying to claim his fifth.

programme.title: World’s Most Evil Killers - Gary Ray Bowles
programme.desc: Season 6, Episode 16 The story of the I-95 killer, who brutally killed six men in 1994 before being executed three years later.

programme.title: Trace of Evil - The Serial Killer of Baton Rouge
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 107 On May 31st 2002, Charlotte Murray Pace was found stabbed to death in her home in Sharlo, Baton Rouge. DNA evidence was so strong that the prosecutor decided to hang the whole case on it.

programme.title: Trace of Evil - The Butcher of Louisiana
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 108 The story of how a deeply disturbed and twisted serial killer was stopped in his tracks by the tire mark he left at the scene of one of his crimes.

programme.title: Trace of Evil - The Butcher of Louisiana
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 108 The story of how a deeply disturbed and twisted serial killer was stopped in his tracks by the tire mark he left at the scene of one of his crimes.

programme.title: Trace of Evil - The Murder of Gemma McCluskie
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 109 The body of Eastenders actress, Gemma McCluskie was discovered in the Regents canal in 2012. Dogged detective work and detailed forensic examination eventually led police to her killer.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation - A Matter of Time
programme.desc: Season 5, Episode 9 Picard's quest to save an endangered planet leads him to violate a Prime Directive when he seeks advice from a visitor from the future.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation - New Ground
programme.desc: Season 5, Episode 10 Worf learns some painful lessons about parenting when his son Alexander arrives to join his father on the Enterprise.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation - Hero Worship
programme.desc: Season 5, Episode 11 A young boy who is the sole survivor of a devastated ship becomes obsessed with simulating Data.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation - Violations
programme.desc: Season 5, Episode 12 Troi, Riker and Dr. Crusher fall into unexplained comas while the Enterprise plays host to an alien race.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation - The Masterpiece Society
programme.desc: Season 5, Episode 13 Picard's efforts to save a genetically engineered society from a natural disaster threaten to destroy it.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation - Conundrum
programme.desc: Season 5, Episode 14 While suffering an unexplained case of amnesia, the crew finds themselves fighting a war they do not remember or understand.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation - Power Play
programme.desc: Season 5, Episode 15 Inhabited by alien spirits, Data and Troi overthrow the Bridge of the Enterprise.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation - Ethics
programme.desc: Season 5, Episode 16 Loyalty and ethics clash when a paralyzed Worf asks to help him commit suicide.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation - The Outcast
programme.desc: Season 5, Episode 17 A rescue mission leads to a dangerous romance between Riker and a rebellious member of an androgynous race.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation - Cause and Effect
programme.desc: Season 5, Episode 18 The Enterprise is trapped in a time warp that forces the crew to endlessly repeat the same experiences.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation - The First Duty
programme.desc: Season 5, Episode 19 Caught between loyalty to his friends and the need to tell the truth, Wesley becomes involved in a cover-up when his Starfleet Academy squadron suffers a deadly collision.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation - Cost of Living
programme.desc: Season 5, Episode 20 Preparing for her wedding aboard the Enterprise, Troi's free-thinking mother causes trouble between Worf and his son.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation - The Perfect Mate
programme.desc: Season 5, Episode 21 A beautiful woman, chosen by her people to serve as a peace offering to end a centuries-long war, falls in love with Picard.

programme.title: Snow Queen - Episode 2
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 2 A mysterious, icy woman shows up to the hotel and kidnaps Gerda's new love, Kai. This sends Gerda on an adventure to rescue her boyfriend from a chilling fate.

programme.title: Highlander: The Series - Avatar
programme.desc: Season 6, Episode 1 MacLeod returns to Paris vowing to destroy Ahriman.

programme.title: Highlander: The Series - Armageddon
programme.desc: Season 6, Episode 2 Not even Holy Ground is sanctuary, as MacLeod wrestles with Ahriman in the final battle.

programme.title: Highlander: The Series - Sins of the Father
programme.desc: Season 6, Episode 3 Duncan runs into Alex Raven, a beautiful Immortal set upon fulfilling a vow dating back to World War II...no matter who gets in her way.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone - And When the Sky Was Opened
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 11 Three astronauts have returned from this first space flight. Major Gart is hospitalized with a broken leg. The other two, Colonels Harrington and Forbes head for a bar. Harrington gets a strange feeling…

programme.title: The Twilight Zone - What You Need
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 12 A two-bit thug thinks he's found the key to a better life in an old sidewalk salesman who has the uncanny ability to tell people what they need the most.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone - The Four of Us are Dying
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 13 A man who can change his face to resemble others gets into hot water with gangsters.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone - Third From the Sun
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 14 With all-out nuclear war about to ignite, a scientist and his pilot friend plot to escape on an experimental spaceship.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone - I Shot an Arrow into the Air
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 15 Three astronauts crash on what they believe to be an asteroid. Unfortunately, they have only limited water supplies to sustain them.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone - The Hitch-Hiker
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 16 Alone on a cross-country trip, a woman continually sees the same hitch-hiker everywhere she looks.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone - The Fever
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 17 Tight-fisted Franklin Gibbs is not pleased when his wife wins a trip for two to Las Vegas. But things change when he falls under the spell of a slot machine that calls his name.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone - The Last Flight
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 18 A World War I flying ace flies through a mysterious cloud - and lands at a modern U.S. airbase in the year 1959!

programme.title: Farscape - Farscape: S3 E9 - Losing Time
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 9 The crew of Moya starts blacking out and missing portions of time.

programme.title: Farscape - Farscape: S3 E10 - Relativity
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 10 Talyn lands on a planet covered mostly with vegetation that will help him to heal. Crichton, Aeryn and Crais leave the ship in search of Xhalax.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone - The Purple Testament
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 19 Lt. Fitzgerald has found his own special wartime hell. Looking into the faces of his men prior to battle, he has the disquieting ability to see who is about to die.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone - Elegy
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 20 Three astronauts land on what looks like Earth 200 years before they left--only all of the people seem frozen in time.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone - Mirror Image
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 21 Millicent Barnes sees her double at a bus terminal.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone - The Monsters are Due on Maple Street
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 22 Paranoia strikes the residents of Maple Street when they believe human-looking aliens have invaded the neighborhood.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone - A World of Difference

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation (Embed) - HOME SOIL
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 117 Picard finds himself facing a strenuous test of his loyalty to Starfleet, one which the other members of the crew are struggling to cope with, whilst Wesley faces an equally challenging entrance exam at Starfleet Academy.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation (Embed) - EVOLUTION*
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 150 The Enterprise is carrying an eminent scientist, Dr. Paul Stubbs, to the site of a binary star where they are expecting a massive stellar explosion to occur in a few hours.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation (Embed) - LEGACY
programme.desc: Season 4, Episode 180 The crew of the Enterprise enters into orbit around the home planet of their former crew-mate, Tasha Yar, where they encounter her sister.

programme.title: Star Trek: Voyager - The Killing Game, Part 2
programme.desc: Season 4, Episode 19 World War II happens all over again as a holodeck simulation spills out onto the decks of Voyager.

programme.title: Star Trek: Voyager - Vis A Vis
programme.desc: Season 4, Episode 20 When the Voyager stops to help an alien repair his ship, the alien switches bodies with Paris.

programme.title: Star Trek: Voyager - The Omega Directive
programme.desc: Season 4, Episode 21 Voyager comes across a space phenomenon that must be destroyed at all costs.

programme.title: Star Trek: Voyager - Unforgettable
programme.desc: Season 4, Episode 22 Chakotay meets a woman he once loved, but he has no memory of her.

programme.title: Star Trek: Voyager - Living Witness
programme.desc: Season 4, Episode 23 Hundreds of years in the future, the Voyager crew is accused of murder.

programme.title: Star Trek: Voyager - Demon
programme.desc: Season 4, Episode 24 An alien species tries to populate its planet by duplicating the Voyager crew.

programme.title: Star Trek: Voyager - One
programme.desc: Season 4, Episode 25 With the fate of the crew in her hands, Seven must face her deepest fears alone.

programme.title: Star Trek: Voyager - Hope And Fear
programme.desc: Season 4, Episode 26 When Starfleet sends a ship to bring the Voyager crew home, it seems too good to be true.

programme.title: Star Trek: Voyager - Night
programme.desc: Season 5, Episode 1 Janeway's actions could cost the crew their chance of reaching home.

programme.title: Star Trek: Voyager - Drone
programme.desc: Season 5, Episode 2 The pupil becomes the teacher when a Borg drone is born on Voyager and Seven of Nine instructs him in the ways of humanity.

programme.title: Star Trek: Voyager - Extreme Risk
programme.desc: Season 5, Episode 3 A need to test herself leads Torres down a path of self-destruction.

programme.title: Star Trek: Voyager - In The Flesh
programme.desc: Season 5, Episode 4 The Voyager crew discovers an alien training ground for the destruction of Earth.

programme.title: Star Trek: Voyager - Once Upon A Time
programme.desc: Season 5, Episode 5 Neelix balks at telling Naomi that her mother and others have gone missing on an away mission.

programme.title: Unsolved Mysteries with Robert Stack - Episode: 4

programme.desc: Season 7, Episode 20 This episode includes: Mystery Hum, UD: School Bus Family, Car Crash Thank You & UD, Dial's Escape & UD and Taking a Dive & UD.

programme.title: Unsolved Mysteries with Robert Stack - Episode: 18
programme.desc: Season 5, Episode 18 This episode includes: Rainboy, Motorcycle Murder, Hospital Hoax & UD Hoax and Best Friend's Sister.

programme.title: Unsolved Mysteries with Robert Stack - Episode: 8

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic - Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 16 A police investigator discovers a letter written 16 years earlier that provides clues to a woman's murder. And a firearms expert supplies the evidence that South Carolina authorities need to put a man on trial in 2002 for a murder committed in 1961.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic - Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Season 5, Episode 20 DNA found on a marijuana joint in Florida in 2005 helps to solve the 1988 rape and murder of a California woman. And a cold case of murder in Illinois heats up when a jailhouse lawyer turns jailhouse snitch.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic - Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 21 A quarter of a century after the murders of two nurses, Canadian police suspect that a former Toronto cop committed the crimes. A blow to the head of a garbage collector in San Jose leaves strange markings.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic - Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 13 Police reopen a rape-murder case 25 years after the crime and find enough DNA evidence to bring him to justice. And a confession made to a "Baywatch" TV star helps police solve the three-year-old riddle of a wealthy Newport Beach woman's murder.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic - Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 15 Police solve a murder when divers find a skeleton in a car at the bottom of a river, and a dead dog's DNA helps crack open a 6-year-old case.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic - Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Season 9, Episode 2 The murder of an Ohio woman in 1974 is solved more than 20 years later after police get a crucial clue--the woman's husband was seen building a coffin-shaped box about the time the woman disappeared.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic - Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Season 5, Episode 4 Work of an Alberta, Canada detective finally pays off when he tracks down the man who murdered a 6-year-old girl 10 years earlier. And when police search for the killer of a hitchhiker, they find that the victim's diary is one of their best clues.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic - Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 24 A mother is suspected in the murders of two of her daughters when her third daughter finally convinces police to reopen two cold cases.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic - The Merry Widow (#53)/The Missing Informant (#15)
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 4 In 1983, Navy seamen Sonny Grotton left base for a long weekend at home. But as he pulled into his driveway, a gunman killed him. And in 1993, former state trooper Doug Wright claimed his estranged wife shot and killed herself in their home.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic - Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Season 4, Episode 9 When a Nevada couple demands the return of a baby they had sold to another couple, the burned body of the baby turns up in Arizona. Then, a man discovers a barrel in his crawlspace that contains the body of a woman who has been dead for decades.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic - Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 1 After 46 years, LA homicide detectives take a Lover's Lane bandit who also gunned down two police officers into custody. Then, DNA testing helps lead police in Florida to a suspected killer, however, the killer has an identical twin.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic - Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 24 A mother is suspected in the murders of two of her daughters when her third daughter finally convinces police to reopen two cold cases.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic - Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 5 A 13-year-old girl's mother is murdered and 20 years later she helps bring the killer to justice, and a dogged policeman gets to the bottom of the brutal murder of a 63-year-old newspaper delivery woman.

programme.title: MST3K: Robot Wars - MST3K: Robot Wars
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 1 Jonah's crew watch ROBOT WARS (1993). A new SOL is introduced and a new Gizmonic tech arrives.

programme.title: Film Crew The Giant of Marathon - Film Crew: The Giant of Marathon
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 1 The Film Crew rip apart B-Movie legend Steve Reeves and The Giant of Marathon.

programme.title: MST3K: Gunslinger - MST3K: Gunslinger
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 1 The widow of a murdered sheriff attempts to clean up the crime in her small town with help from the man hired to kill her.

programme.title: Film Crew: The Wild Women of Wongo - Film Crew: The Wild Women of Wongo (2007)
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 1 Bob Honcho orders the Film Crew to provide a commentary track for the bizarre prehistoric adventure film, The Wild Women of Wongo (1958).

programme.title: MST3K Shorts - MST3K Shorts: A Date With Your Family
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 19 Learn the many ways you've acted improperly during family dinners in this 1950s short.

programme.title: MST3K: Being From Another Planet - MST3K: Being From Another Planet
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 1 Joel and the Bots watch a re-edited version of Time Walker (1982) called "Being From Another Planet" in which a mummy awakened by a university team goes on a killing spree.

programme.title: MST3K Shorts - MST3K Shorts: Hired! (Part 1)
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 17 The first part of this essential guide to modern car sales techniques.

programme.title: MST3K: Bride Of The Monster - MST3K: Bride Of The Monster
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 1 Horror cinema icons Bela Lugosi and Tor Johnson star in this Ed Wood classic as the crazed Dr. Vornoff and his beastly assistant Lobo, who conduct heinous experiments on human victims in an effort to create a race of atomic super-beings.

programme.title: MST3K: Cave Dwellers - Cave Dwellers
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 1 Wise ruler Akronas (aka “The Great One”) is the keeper of an incredibly powerful but potentially deadly device.

programme.title: Once Upon a Winter's Date - Once Upon a Winter's Date
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 1 Katherine, a workaholic executive, endures the worst Valentine's Day date of her life. On her walk home, a gypsy weaves a magical spell on her and when she wakes up the next morning, she realizes it's Valentine's Day again.

programme.title: The Magic of Ordinary Days - The Magic of Ordinary Days
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 1 Pregnant out of wedlock, an educated young woman is pressured by her father into an arranged marriage with a lonely farmer in this drama set during WWII. Stars Keri Russell and Skeet Ulrich.

programme.title: A Painted House - A Painted House
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 1 10-year-old Luke had never kept a secret or told a lie. But when two groups of migrant workers-and two dangerous men-come to work the family's Arkansas cotton farm, mysteries suddenly flood Luke's world.

programme.title: My Sister's Keeper - My Sister's Keeper
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 1 Two sisters embark on a journey of discovery and reconciliation in this poignant real-life story based on the memoirs of Margaret Moorman.

programme.title: Mitch Albom's Have a Little Faith - Mitch Albom's Have a Little Faith
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 1 The story follows the spiritual journeys of three men: a suburban rabbi, an inner-city pastor, and an author. Stars Bradley Whitford, Laurence Fishburne, and Martin Landau. From the Hallmark Hall of Fame Collection.

programme.title: Decoration Day - Decoration Day
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 1 A grumpy man must rejoin his community when his godchild gets in trouble and a childhood friend refuses to accept a Congressional Medal of Honor for bravery in World War II. From the Hallmark Hall of Fame Collection.

programme.title: Missing Pieces - Missing Pieces
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 1 A Colorado rancher uncovers a bed of lies and unanswered questions as he investigates his son's apparent suicide. Stars James Coburn. From the Hallmark Hall of Fame Collection.

programme.title: Hallmark Movies & More - Hallmark Movies & More
programme.desc: no info available

programme.title: Stargate Atlantis - Inquisition
programme.desc: Season 5, Episode 13 A newly formed galactic coalition extends an invitation to Lt. Col. John Sheppard and his team to represent Atlantis at their next meeting. But on arrival, the team is immediately detained and must stand trial for crimes against humanity.

programme.title: Stargate Atlantis - The Prodigal
programme.desc: Season 5, Episode 14 Atlantis is suddenly plunged into darkness, with only the top tier of the central tower unaffected. As Sheppard and McKay attempt to get to the top level, they discover that a force field has been established to prevent them from gaining access.

programme.title: Stargate Atlantis - Remnants
programme.desc: Season 5, Episode 15 While Richard Woolsey (Robert Picardo) struggles to keep his position as the leader of Atlantis, and McKay (David Hewlett) and Zelenka (David Nykl) investigate a mysterious find, Sheppard is captured by an old enemy with plans to invade the city.

programme.title: Stargate Atlantis - Brain Storm
programme.desc: Season 5, Episode 16 When the Atlantis team is given two weeks of vacation leave, Dr. Rodney McKay reluctantly accepts an invitation by his former rival, Malcolm Tunney, to attend a scientific demonstration that he claims will be the solution to global warming.

programme.title: Stargate Universe - Life
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 9 Using the communications stones, Lt. Scott and Camile Wray use their time back on Earth to visit those they’ve left behind. Aboard Destiny, the crew stumbles upon a piece of Ancient technology that carries the promise of a way home.

programme.title: Stargate Universe - Justice
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 10 Everyone is shocked when a member of the crew is found dead from a gunshot wound. While it appears to be suicide, the gun is nowhere to be found…until it shows up in Col. Young’s (Louis Ferreira) quarters and he becomes the number one suspect.

programme.title: Stargate Universe - Space
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 11 An alien vessel appears in Destiny’s path and launches an attack, capturing Chloe. Col. Young must use the stones again to get aboard the ship and try to rescue Chloe. He quickly realizes, however, that Chloe isn’t the only prisoner aboard.

programme.title: Stargate Universe - Divided
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 12 Suspecting an alien tracking device may be hidden somewhere aboard the Destiny, Col. Young and Lt. Scott search the ship’s hull. While distracted by the search, a group aboard the Destiny puts in action a coup that has life-threatening consequences.

programme.title: Stargate SG-1 - Between Two Fires
programme.desc: Season 5, Episode 9 The SG-1 team returns to Tollana for the funeral of Chancellor Omoc, only to discover the rulers have reversed their policy on technology sharing and will now trade advanced weaponry with Earth. But is there a secret agenda behind the gesture?

programme.title: Stargate SG-1 - 2001
programme.desc: Season 5, Episode 10 SG-1 discover an opportunity to form an alliance with an advanced race who are willing to share their technology. They are the Aschen, the danger of whom the future SG-1 team warned about. Will the truth be revealed before it is too late?

programme.title: Stargate SG-1 - Desperate Measures
programme.desc: Season 5, Episode 11 When Major Carter is abducted by a reclusive billionaire with nefarious plans that threaten her life, O'Neill and the rest of the SG-1 team must work with an old adversary to solve the mystery of her disappearance and bring her back alive!

programme.title: Stargate SG-1 - Wormhole X-Treme!
programme.desc: Season 5, Episode 12 A ship headed for Earth is linked to the pod found through the alien Martin. Investigating what he knows, SG-1 finds Martin has become a consultant on a sci-fi series called Wormhole X-treme!, with a plot uncannily like the Stargate program!

programme.title: Stargate SG-1 - Proving Ground
programme.desc: Season 5, Episode 13 Col. Jack O'Neill (Richard Dean Anderson) and his new SG recruits have become the targets of a secret hostile takeover. Now it's up to a wounded O'Neill and his neophyte troop to save the command center from a possible alien invasion!
